long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Motivation Status" - The Ultimate Chrome Extension for a Wholesome Browsing Experience

Ready to "Show me your Motivation"? Then discover a unique, engaging, and fun way to block unwanted content and stay focused online with Motivation Status Chrome extension. Designed as the perfect website blocker and productivity booster, it transforms the traditional website-blocking experience, offering you the perfect blend of motivation and functionality. Say goodbye to dull block screens and hello to entertaining Status videos!

Key Features:
- 12 popular and fresh motivational Status videos
- Customizable, absolutely free, and powerful website and keyword blocker
- Effortless blocking of adult content with Absolute Block functionality
- Option to add your own Statuses videos for a personalized touch
- Zero downgrades to your browser performance

ü•ä Outshine Other Website Blockers:
Experience a completely free, user-friendly, and easy-to-set-up website blocker with dedicated developer support to add new features based on your needs as fast and as good as possible. Motivation Status makes it easy to switch from any other website blocking extension. Simply export all websites or keywords from your previous website blocker and use our built-in import feature and enjoy the advantages of our highly customizable block list. Make the switch to Motivation Status and elevate your browsing experience today!

üåü Get Started in a Flash:
Simply pin the Motivation Status extension to your browser bar for easy access. Turn on the Absolute Block feature to block explicit content or customize your block list with specific websites and keywords.

üîí Your Privacy Matters:
Your privacy matters! Extension never stores any personal information, and all your data remains within your browser. Enable the "Allow incognito" option for added protection during your most vulnerable moments.

üõ†Ô∏è Personalize Your Experience:
- Add your own keywords and websites to the block list
- Separate them with space to add multiple keywords quickly
- Search for added keywords
- Turn OFF and ON any keyword without deleting it from the list
- For multi-word blocks, use the "+" symbol (e.g., "watch+online")
- Add your own Statuses or videos for a truly custom experience

üí° Tooltips for Easy Navigation:
Every button and functionality within the extension is equipped with useful tooltips. By simply hovering your mouse over any element, you can easily access helpful tips and information that make the extension extremely user-friendly.

üåê Stay Motivated Everywhere:
Motivation Status extension works seamlessly with various social media platforms and popular websites, allowing you to stay focused and entertained while browsing the internet.

üíñ Become a Supporter:
Ninety percent of the extension's functionality is ABSOLUTELY FREE and you can always support the development to help me further develop this amazing extension. As a supporter, you'll gain access to additional features like Addition of your any own videos, Faster support, and an Exclusive video Status gallery. Plus, you'll have the opportunity to influence the development process by participating in polls, enjoy priority access to new features, and be a part of our mission to build a powerful motivational tool.

Experience a New Wave of Productivity and Fun!
Transform your browsing experience and say goodbye to distractions with Motivation Status, the ultimate Chrome extension for focus, motivation, and entertainment. Don't miss out on this exciting and engaging way to stay on track and enjoy the internet. Install Motivation Status today!
